albums.title: Wide Awake!
albums.story: This album meant a lot to me in 2018 when it came out. In such a politically charged time, this album skates between the political and the emotional in a perfect way. It's a critique of society that pulls at my heart strings. It was my anthem in 2018, and it will always mean a lot to me.
